channel.title: Latest News on IIBMers
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on IIBMers

item.title: 1st Annual PhD. Symposium
item.description: We are glad to invite you to our first Advances in Biological and Medical Engineering’s annual symposium. Organized by the community of the Institute of Biological and Medical Engineering (IIBM), this event aims to showcase international interdisciplinary research and development ongoing at the IIBM for the scientific community at all levels: students, professors, and all people interested in this field.

item.title: IIBM Networking 2021
item.description: The “IIBM Networking 2021” is an instance to know each others research and increase interdisciplinary colaborations. Will be held on December 21th virtually. Important dates Abstract/breakout/workshop submission deadline: December/14 Virtual event/stream: December/21

item.title: Art Digital Life (ADL) 2021
item.description: Art Digital Life (ADL) present to the public a series of art/science pieces in which there is no boundary between them. Art influxes science and science produces beautiful artworks. People may see arts and sciences as different things, even oposites.

item.title: Culturizate Biomed
item.description: Culturizate Biomed activities have started, follow the link to register. Details about the activities: Monday 29 nov: from 18:00 to 19:00 hrs: “Del docto al Popular”. Wednesday 1 dec: de 18:00 to 19:00 hrs: “¿Qué es la música folclórica?

item.title: Projects 2021
item.description: Since 2019, we have been working different projects and ideas, here is a list and description (pending) of each one 2021 Nanocleaner EPP3D Lab 4.0 ChatBot Culturizate Biomed Malas Vibras Fuera Optimiza tu tesis Biblioteca Anatómica Macetero Inteligente Networking Arti digital life (ADL) Prisma 2020

item.title: Back to the lab
item.description: During 2020 and 2021, the pandemic forced to work remotely from home in our projects and research, we adapted our regular meetings to be online. Lately, the university has allowed to enter the labs, so we started to assist and meet personally.

item.title: Media coverage of projects 2021
item.description: During 2021, we have been working remotely in different projects, we obtained funding from DAE UC and Artificia la UC You can see the post from different sources: Vive la UC.
